amendment.description: Amendments en bloc No. 1, consisting of amendments numbered 9, 10, 16, 24, 36, 63, and 70 printed in House Report 111-498.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A005) offered by Mr. Skelton.
On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
